entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use background Service With SignlarR In Blazor #109711
  • Dynamic CoreCLR embedding? #109704
  • System.Threading.Thread.StartCallback() - System.NullReferenceException #109697
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/regressions/V1/SEH/VJ/MultipleException/MultipleException.cmd #109693
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.HostTests.CreateDefaultBuilder_DoesNotChangeContentRootIfCurrentDirectoryIsWindowsSystemDirectory #109692
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/MethodImpl/CovariantReturns/UnitTest/UnitTestDelegates/UnitTestDelegates.cmd #109691

Closed

  • Add DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes.AllMethods/.AllFields/.AllEvents/etc #88512
    10.0.0
  • API request: Add support for Authenticode code signing #34042
  • nibblemapmacros do a linear scan #93550
    10.0.0
  • BitArray.LeftShift(Int32) Method is broken #73094
    Future
  • UnsafeAccessorAttribute fails to access volatile field #109665
    10.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler does not check for Transfer-Encoding: chunked on response properly #63053
    Future
  • Add debugger display to CancellationTokenSource #105698
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify usage of the installer and shared framework SDKs based on improvements in the tooling #109710
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ignore modopts/modreqs for `UnsafeAccessor` field targets #109709
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.x
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan (Try 2) #109707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Re-try loading ENGINE keys with a non-NULL UI_METHOD #109706
    area-System.Security
  • Pass BaseOS property down to the inner build as well #109705
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove `netcoreapp >= 7.0` condition #109701
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Define a DllMain for native AOT shared libraries #109699
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #109698
    area-GC-mono
  • Add a diagnostic mode for ArrayPool.Shared #109695
    area-System.Runtime

Merged

  • Implement `DAMT.*WithInherited` #109608
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] add v2 ExecutionManager contract for NibbleMap change #109654
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Slight clean-up of mock descriptors test helpers #109651
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Ignore modopts/modreqs for `UnsafeAccessor` field targets #109694
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 10.0.0
  • Use IsNative metadata to exclude native shared libs #109683
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • JIT: Mark some intrinsics as must-expand for NAOT due to ILScanner dependencies #109609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: tail merge returns with multiple statements #109670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile instead of USERPROFILE #108559
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109510
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.1
  • JIT: enable tail merge for try exits #109661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for (experimental) profile-based trimming #108049
    Hackathon, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix native AOT repro project #109700
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update IHttpClientLogger.cs and IHttpClientAsyncLogger.cs remarks #109618
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution

Updated

  • [EventTrace] AddEventPipe filter data parsing #109624
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add left-handed spherical and cylindrical billboards #109605
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, NO-SQUASH, Hackathon, area-Infrastructure
  • Build the cdac as part of clr.tools instead of as a prereq to the runtime native build #109598
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Add support for deterministic compilation #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • JIT: postdominators #109656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #109112
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Bump TraceEvent package version #109192
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rework HttpClient content buffering #109642
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    area-System.Runtime, os-windows-nano, community-contribution
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Add ObsoleteAttribute and EditorBrowsable(Never) to DynamicDependency.Condition #107104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [HTTP] WinHttpHandler - Increase the default drain size #109610
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • MailAddress accepts invalid email address with consecutive dots #109690
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 130.0.6723.116, windows: 131.0.6778.33 #109678
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
